Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.CONCERTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.VIEWERS V ON C.CONCERT_ID = V.CONCERT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.PLACES P ON C.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.ARTISTS A ON C.ARTIST_ID = A.ARTIST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.COLLABORATORS_CONCERTS CC ON C.CONCERT_ID = CC.CONCERT_ID #WHERE# GROUP BY C.CONCERT_ID, CONCERT_DATE, TYPE_ID, PLACE_NAME, CITY, COUNT_VIEWERS, ARTIST_NAME ORDER BY V.COUNT_VIEWERS DESC

SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.CONCERTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.ARTISTS A ON C.ARTIST_ID = A.ARTIST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.ARTISTS_GENRES AG ON A.ARTIST_ID = AG.ARTIST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.GENRES G ON AG.GENRE_ID = G.GENRE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.PLACES P ON C.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.COLLABORATORS_CONCERTS CC ON C.CONCERT_ID = CC.CONCERT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.COLLABORATORS CO ON CC.COLLABORATOR_ID = CO.COLLABORATOR_ID GROUP BY C.CONCERT_ID, CONCERT_NAME, CONCERT_DATE, CONCERT_URL, TYPE_ID, PLACE_NAME, CITY, PROVINCE, ARTIST_NAME, ARTIST_IMAGE

SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM ${mainschema}.CONCERTS C LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.PLACES P ON C.PLACE_ID = P.PLACE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.ARTISTS A ON C.ARTIST_ID = A.ARTIST_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${mainschema}.COLLABORATORS_CONCERTS CC ON C.CONCERT_ID = CC.CONCERT_ID #WHERE# GROUP BY C.CONCERT_ID, CONCERT_DATE, TYPE_ID, PLACE_NAME, CITY, ARTIST_NAME ORDER BY C.CONCERT_DATE
